none"><span lang="EN-US">语言从键盘输入数据</span></span></a></span><span style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">》一节讲到了<span lang="EN-US"> getchar()</span>、<span lang="EN-US">getche()</span>、<span lang="EN-US">getch()
</span>函数，它们都用来从控制台获取字符，<span lang="EN-US">getchar() </span>会等待用户按下回车键才开始读取，而<span lang="EN-US"> getche()</span>、<span lang="EN-US">getch() </span>会立即读取。这是因为<span lang="EN-US"> getchar() </span>带有缓冲区，用户输入的数据会暂时保存到缓冲区，直到按下回车键才开始读取；而<span lang="EN-US"> getche()</span>、<span lang="EN-US">getch() </span>不带缓冲区，只能立即读取。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
宋体;color:#333333;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
<!--[if !supportLineBreakNewLine]--><br>
<!--[endif]--></span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:宋体;
mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>

宋体;color:#333333;background:#EEEEEE;mso-font-kerning:0pt">函数的特点是：如果缓冲区中没有内容，那么等待用户输入；如果有内容，哪怕一个字符，也会直接从缓冲区中读取数据，不会等待用户输入。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;font-family:"微软雅黑",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
